name: Otokomizu～漢水～
description: Hovering in the sky over Edo City with a loincloth! A jet pack firefighting 3D action feelinggame with the most mysterious operation ever!
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 10 or later Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce GTX 750 Ti DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 5 GB available space
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
